WHY MAKE IC ENGAGEMENT COMPLICATED? When you break it down, is contractor engagement really so complicated?
I talk to a lot of folks in companies of all sizes who have a shallow understanding of the Independent Contractor misclassification issue. Many believe that mitigating the risk is complicated, messy and involves a lot of “change management.” Read More <http://www.staffingindustry.com/Research-Publications/Blogs/Andrew-Karpie-s-Blog/The-Two-Sides-of-MBO-Partners-Things-May-Not-Always-Be-What-They-Seem2> KELLY, ODESK AND ONE BIG QUESTION Kelly Services and oDesk recently announced <https://www.odesk.com/info/about/press/releases/kelly-services-and-odesk-announce-alliance-first-between-workforce-solutions-company-and-online-work-platform/> an “alliance,” combining a traditional staffing company with an online freelance market for the first time in industry history.
